game.name: Pichu Bros. Mini - Hoppip's Jump Match
game.desc: The game stars the Pichu Bros. that starred in the anime and in Pokémon Channel. It features six mini-games and is a similar to Pokémon Party mini, so much so that this can be considered the game's successor. While the game's main characters are Pichu, there are a variety of other Pokémon present as well such as Pikachu, Hoppip, Teddiursa, Cubone, and others.

game.name: Pichu Bros. Mini - Netsukikyuu
game.desc: Skateboard Pichu est essentiellement un jeu de course sans fin. En cela, vous incarnez l'un des Pichu sur une planche à roulettes alors qu'il traverse le niveau. Souvent, vous arriverez devant un saut ou ? un obstacle. Lorsque cela se produit, vous devez secouer la mini-console Pokémon pour activer le saut et atterrir en toute sécurité. Si vous le faites, le jeu continue et vous obtenez différents points bonus. Le but est d'aller aussi loin que possible et d'obtenir le plus de points possible.

game.name: Pichu Bros. Mini - Netsukikyuu
game.desc: Skateboard Pichu est essentiellement un jeu de course sans fin. En cela, vous incarnez l'un des Pichu sur une planche à roulettes alors qu'il traverse le niveau. Souvent, vous arriverez devant un saut ou ? un obstacle. Lorsque cela se produit, vous devez secouer la mini-console Pokémon pour activer le saut et atterrir en toute sécurité. Si vous le faites, le jeu continue et vous obtenez différents points bonus. Le but est d'aller aussi loin que possible et d'obtenir le plus de points possible.

game.name: Pichu Bros. Mini
game.desc: Pichu Bros. Mini? is a collection of several mini games, similar to Pokémon Party Mini.

game.name: Pokémon Anime Card Daisakusen
game.desc: Pokémon Zany Cards is a small collection of four card games featuring Pokémon-oriented cards.

game.name: Pokémon Anime Card Daisakusen
game.desc: Pokémon Zany Cards is a small collection of four card games featuring Pokémon-oriented cards.

game.name: Pokémon Party Mini
game.desc: Pokémon Party Mini is a collection of several minigames, including: Hitmonchan's Boxing, where you shake the system to ?punch'; Pikachu's Rocket Start, a game where you have to launch off a starting line before another Pokémon; Bellossom's Dance, a DDR-like game; Chansey's Dribble, kick the ball to the finish line as quickly as possible; Slowking's Judge, predict if the tennis ball will land in or out of the court; Sneasel's Fakeout, a rock-paper-scissors-like game for two players; Battlefield, where two to six players battle for the highest score; and Celebi's Clock, which is essentially a clock with date, alarm and stopwatch function.

game.name: Pokémon Pinball Mini
game.desc: Pokémon Pinball mini? is a pinball game with several levels where a Diglett or a Pikachu acts as the ?bumping' mechanism.

game.name: Pokémon Puzzle Collection Vol. 2
game.desc: Pokémon Puzzle Collection Vol. 2 is similar to the first puzzle collection, but some games are different and there are 80 new puzzles.

game.name: Pokémon Puzzle Collection
game.desc: Pokémon Puzzle Collection is a collection of different puzzle games such as: Shadow Puzzle, where different shapes are put together to make an image of a Pokémon; Motion Puzzle, a sliding game where an image of a Pokémon has to be unscrambled; Escape, where one has to move blocks to let a Pokémon out of a maze; and a bonus for completing most of your Minidex is the game Power On, a ?Pipe Dream'-like game where one has to connect a Pikachu to a light bulb, creating a circuit).

game.name: Pokémon Puzzle Collection
game.desc: Pokémon Puzzle Collection is a collection of different puzzle games such as: Shadow Puzzle, where different shapes are put together to make an image of a Pokémon; Motion Puzzle, a sliding game where an image of a Pokémon has to be unscrambled; Escape, where one has to move blocks to let a Pokémon out of a maze; and a bonus for completing most of your Minidex is the game Power On, a ?Pipe Dream'-like game where one has to connect a Pikachu to a light bulb, creating a circuit).

game.name: Pokémon Race Mini
game.desc: Pokémon Race Mini is a platform racing competition where the player controls a Pikachu racing against other Pokémon.

game.name: Pokémon Race Mini
game.desc: Pokémon Race Mini is a platform racing competition where the player controls a Pikachu racing against other Pokémon.

game.name: Pokémon Shock Tetris
game.desc: As a variation on the Tetris gameplay them, the game used the motion detection feature of the Pokémon Mini hardware for the players to rotate the falling tetrominoes, and the player received a mild force feedback response to clearing lines of blocks....

game.name: Pokémon Shock Tetris
game.desc: As a variation on the Tetris gameplay them, the game used the motion detection feature of the Pokémon Mini hardware for the players to rotate the falling tetrominoes, and the player received a mild force feedback response to clearing lines of blocks....

game.name: Pokémon Sodateyasan Mini
game.desc: Pokémon Breeder Mini (also known as Pokemon Sodateyasan Mini) is a Tamagotchi-like life simulation, in which the player cares for a young Pokémon, such as Mudkip.

game.name: Snorlax's Lunch Time
game.desc: Snorlax's Lunch Time is an unused Pokémon Party Mini mini game that could be found amongst the other mini games in Pokémon Channel for the Nintendo GameCube.

game.name: Snorlax's Lunch Time
game.desc: Snorlax's Lunch Time is an unused Pokémon Party Mini mini game that could be found amongst the other mini games in Pokémon Channel for the Nintendo GameCube.

game.name: Togepi no Daibouken
game.desc: Togepi's Great Adventure is an adventure game in which you have to guide Togepi out of a tower, avoiding traps.
